name: Microsoft Excel HTML Spreadsheet Template
summary: An XLTHTML file is an HTML version of an .XLT spreadsheet template created with Microsoft Excel, a spreadsheet application. It contains HTML that renders the template using similar formatting as the original XLT file. XLTHTML files are used for viewing published spreadsheet information in a Web browser.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Excel

macos.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Excel
